text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Salutations and good morning to you,<n>my dear trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I can hardly wait to begin our training!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In fact, I was so excited last night that<n>I ran for eight hours
straight! In my<n>dreams, of course!
choice_data_list: Sounds like you got a good night's sleep!
Sounds like you got a good night's sleep!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I sure did!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ahhh... I can't wait to tell my parents.<n>They'll hardly believe
their ears...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Mom, Dad, I did it! I won the Arima<n>Kinen, the Japan Cup,
the Tenno Sho,<n>the Takarazuka Kinen, the Kikuka Sho,<n>and
the Japanese Derby!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Your little genius did it! I've fulfilled<n>my true purpose as
class<n>representative and become the model<n>for
Umamusume everywhere!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In any case, I look forward to seeing<n>what you have in store
for me this<n>afternoon!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In order to win all the G1 races<n>Bakushin O mentioned, an<n>
Umamusume needs to be a<n>well-rounded talent.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
However, in her case, there's only<n>one skill she should
polish...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: With that in mind, I prep for our<n>afternoon training session.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Okay, Trainer, I'm ready! Give me a<n>training regimen worthy
of a class<n>representative!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I quickly go over the regimen I<n>created for Sakura Bakushin
O.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ohoho... So we're doing ladder drills<n>to start, eh? Roger that!
This will make<n>the perfect warm-up!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Watch me finish these drills in three<n>minutes flat! Here I go!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Huff, puff... All done! Now... on topracticing the start of the race!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Just need to get into position and...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Raaah!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Huff, puff... Phew, now THAT'S what<n>I call a warm-up! I'm
on fire!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'm ready to move on to the main<n>event! Let's see, next up
is... an<n>interval run...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wait... Wait, wait, wait, WAAAAIIIT!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: T-Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Wh-what is the meaning of this?! This<n>training regimen...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This is obviously focused on<n>SPRINTING!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This is NOT what we talked about! I<n>refuse to become a
sprinter!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Weren't YOU the one who said we'd<n>overcome every
single race together?!<n>H-how could you—
choice_data_list: First of all, I need you to calm down.
First of all, I need you to calm down.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I-I am calm! I swear!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
B-but these exercises are clearly<n>designed to prepare me
for<n>short-distance sprints! If we were<n>getting ready for
marathons, we'd be<n>working on my pace!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ah...

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Inhale... My sincerest apologies.My reaction was not exactly befittingof my station, was it?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The rational, coolheaded class<n>representative has returned,
so<n>please, explain yourself!
choice_data_list: What's the key to winning every race?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Why, that would be speed, of course!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You must be the fastest on the track,<n>not just at the
beginning or end of the<n>race, but both! Only then can you<n>
reach the finish line before the other<n>racers!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
So if my goal is to be the greatest<n>Umamusume, then I must
be the<n>fastest!
choice_data_list: Right, which is why we're working on speed!
Right, which is why we're working on speed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I-I see! So this is just another step on<n>my journey to
becoming a model<n>class representative I aspire to be!<n>
Brilliant!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Now that I think about it, you DID say<n>you want to use my
speed to take on<n>all the G1 races!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: You... you really DO understand me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I should never have doubted you!<n>From now on, I promise
to believe in<n>you, no matter what! This, I swear!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Anyway, back to training! Bakushin,<n>Bakushiiin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With Sakura Bakushin O's trust in me<n>now solidified, we
spend our days<n>building up her speed until finally, it's<n>time
to put her skills to the test.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Graaah!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Raaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Sakura Bakushin O leaps out ofthe starting gate and takes the lead inno time flat! What astounding speed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Bakushin, Bakushin, Bakushiiiiin!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Finish! Sakura Bakushin O maintains<n>her lead and finishes
in first place! Her<n>speed has the crowd going wild!<n>Listen
to those cheers!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Yeeeaaah!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha! Thank you, thank you! Your<n>beloved class
representative couldn't<n>have done it without you!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Completely obliterating the<n>competition, Sakura Bakushin O
has<n>won her debut race, the 1,200-meter<n>dirt course!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer! Class representativeand first-place winner, SakuraBakushin O, at your service!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Hehe... You know, I could beasking you why my debut race is asprint, but I won't!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
This is just an appetizer, isn't it?!<n>Don't worry, I've got
your plan aaall<n>figured out!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I trust you to make me the perfect<n>class representative! One
with a win in<n>every G1 race under her belt! Let's<n>get this
Bakushin show on the road!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This "Bakushin show" certainly does<n>have a long road
ahead of it, but<n>Sakura Bakushin O and I are<n>determined to
make it work.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps someday... in the distant<n>future... We can make her
dreams<n>come true!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Look out, future, here we come!<n>Bakushin, Bakushiiin!
